text: Aurora Walker (1904–1964) was a Mexican film actress. She appeared in more than a hundred and twenty films during her career.Agrasánchez p.159 ==Selected filmography== * Por mis pistolas (1938) * The Whip (1939) * In the Times of Don Porfirio (1940) * The Genius (1948) * The Desire (1948) * Jalisco Fair (1948) * A Gringo Girl in Mexico (1951) * A Galician Dances the Mambo (1951) * Arrabalera (1951) * The Ghost Falls In Love (1953) * The White Sister (1960) ==References== ==Bibliography== * Rogelio Agrasánchez. Guillermo Calles: A Biography of the Actor and Mexican Cinema Pioneer. McFarland, 2010. ==External links== * Category:1904 births Category:1964 deaths Category:Mexican film actresses Category:20th-century Mexican actresses Category:Actresses from Mexico City
title: Aurora Walker
